1370: Oderada was born in Muelen straet in 1370.
Got married to Ever at age 19 in 1370.
1371: Gave birth to Godeweris in 1371 at age 20.
1373: Gave birth to Justaes in 1373 at age 22.
1374: Gave birth to Snellard in 1374 at age 23.
1375: Lost son Justaes when Justaes was 3 years old.
1376: Gave birth to Wauthem in 1376 at age 25.
1390: Lost son Wauthem when Wauthem was 15 years old.
1394: Lost daughter Godeweris when Godeweris was 24 years old.
Has seen several of their children die.
